name: The Reversed Empress, the Tower, the Hanged Man
name_original: The Reversed Empress, the Tower, the Hanged Man
description: This game was made for Divination Jam. I used a Roulette Wheel, Dice, Tarot Cards, and Automatic Writing to determine the plot, characters, and setting. I used a Colour Generator to influence the colour choices, letting randomness intervene as much as possible.
